holidays.title: Ashura
holidays.description: Ashura is a holy day for Muslims, celebrated in the Islamic month of Muharram.

holidays.title: Fresh Spinach Day
holidays.description: Get your fresh spinach and enjoy this delicious healthy green, raw or cooked.

holidays.title: Guinea Pig Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Guinea pigs as pets are a must for anyone looking for a loving furry friend.

holidays.title: Guru Purnima
holidays.description: Guru Purnima is dedicated to paying respect and expressing gratitude to one's spiritual and academic teachers.

holidays.title: Harela
holidays.description: Celebrate the day by planting saplings so that we can maintain the earth’s greenery.

holidays.title: La Paz day
holidays.description: Here’s how you too can commemorate the La Paz freedom fight and honor their celebrations.

holidays.title: Manu’a Cession Day (in lieu)
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Manu’a Cession Day the American Samoa way.

holidays.title: National Atomic Veterans Day
holidays.description: Take part in honoring the service and sacrifice of America’s atomic veterans.

holidays.title: National Cherry Day
holidays.description: We can’t blame George Washington for allegedly chopping down that cherry tree.

holidays.title: National D.R.E.S.S. Syndrome Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn and raise awareness about National D.R.E.S.S. Syndrome Day.

holidays.title: National Personal Chef Day
holidays.description: Today we honor the relentless hard work and efforts of personal chefs.

holidays.title: National Wedding Invitation Day
holidays.description: Let’s explore the history of the wedding invite and how it evolved to today’s multi-style creation.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Mount Carmel
holidays.description: Our Lady of Mount Carmel celebrates Mary, patroness of the Carmelite Order.

holidays.title: Rural Transit Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to find out more about the National R.T.A.P. and facts about rural transit!

holidays.title: Saune Sankranti
holidays.description: Celebrate Saune Sankranti, when the sun enters Cancer and the purifying month begins.

holidays.title: Tassoua
holidays.description: Learn important things about the Muslim culture as you get ready to celebrate Tasu’a.

holidays.title: The Feast of Our Lady of Mount Carmel
holidays.description: Prepare to observe this feast in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary.

holidays.title: World Snake Day
holidays.description: Where did snakes come from and why are they so important for the world?

holidays.title: Corey Feldman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Corey Scott Feldman has sustained an acting career for more than five decades.

holidays.title: Katrina Kaif’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a multi-award-winning actress who is entertaining the masses with her roles!

holidays.title: Kaylyn Sans’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating the beautiful rising star of Instagram, Kaylyn Sans.

holidays.title: Luke Hemmings’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer and songwriter has intoxicated the world with his music.

holidays.title: Will Ferrell’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor and comedian is an inspiration for present and future actors.

holidays.title: Wizkid’s Birthday
holidays.description: Wizkid is regarded as one of the biggest and most influential African artists of all time.
